author: Predeactor
A bit of everyone who helped
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not save data about users persistently.
short: Akinator will guess a real or fictitious character by answering questions.
description: Akinator, the genius, will read in your mind and guess who you are thinking of! Answer Akinator's questions and get impressed by his talent!
install_msg:
Thank for installing my Akinator cog! As always, this cog is in beta, but available and should be working fine.
Actually, you've installed a normal version of akinator.py, but you can speed it up by using `[p]pipinstall akinator.py[fast_async]`, if you error out, you may be unable to get the speedup.
Error should be reported at my repo, at https://github.com/Predeactor/Predeactor-Cogs, but go get some support in my server, in here: https://discord.gg/zg6ydua
